At single-blind stage I , eligible subject receive 1-week run-in period follow 1-week NOX-100 treatment dose 0.4mg/kg/hr . In NOX-100 treatment phase , subject subsequently receive NOX-100 dose 1.2 , 2.5 , 5 , 10 mg/kg/hr first three dialysis session week .
